name: Cavea
description: Media request management with admin approval workflow and enhanced search capabilities
overview: Adds media request system with user submissions and admin approval, smart search toggle between local and global sources, automatic TV client local search enforcement, and seamless Gelato integration for external content discovery

versions.changelog: Hotfix: Removed native runtime dependencies to fix BadImageFormatException on non-x64 systems (e.g., ARM, Windows).
Implemented persistent database caching for search metadata, ensuring efficient Gelato calls and reliable data retrieval.
Cleaned up metadata endpoints: removed TMDB API key dependency, switched modals to use direct Gelato/Stremio proxy. Cached endpoints confirmed for episodes and reviews.
Added external subtitles endpoint, removed subtitle cache and improved name parsing
Optimized subtitle fetching with short-term in-memory cache to prevent frequent re-fetching during playback/browsing.
Fixed subtitle proxy cache miss issue by ensuring fetched subtitles are saved to database and adding auto-recovery to proxy endpoint.
Removed subtitle caching - external subtitles now fetched directly from Gelato each time.
Modified reviews API endpoint for RapidAPI v2, removed stream/catalog/subtitle caching to simplify database (reviews only), and standardized log messages with âšª emoji.
Initial release of Cavea. Cleaned up dependencies.
